Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Theophany (Ps 91:10-11):

Text.Language: Piy~m/i efe~viri m~v~r/] mpibeni: ouoh efe~a~sai m~v~r/] m~pisencifi n~te piLibanoc. n/etr/t qen p/i m~P[oic ouoh euvori e~bolqen niaul/ou n~te p/i mPennou].
The righteous shall flourish like a palm tree; He shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon. Those who are planted in the house of the Lord Shall flourish in the courts of our God.
اَلصِّدِّيقُ كَالنَّخْلَةِ يَزْهُو كَالأَرْزِ فِي لُبْنَانَ يَنْمُو. مَغْرُوسِينَ فِي بَيْتِ الرَّبِّ فِي دِيَارِ إِلَهِنَا يُزْهِرُونَ.
